Text.val: 29.09.2014 SH SCR19175 Changed selection of BNKA (diff. depends on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y/N)
26.09.2014 SH SCR19175 Changed update of v.VAT_NUMBER (now always updated with CLIC_ID, CLID is obtained now
16.04.2014 GB SCR18833 Added some changes (see SCR to get more details)
11.12.2013 GB SCR18501 Chnaged external name, added fourth line in section :70:
21.11.2013 GB SCR18530 Set v.VAT_NUMBER with CLIC_ID if ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y else with DHIC_ID
19.11.2013 GB SCR18530 Added test (5) Omit all initial non-numeric characters from DHIC_ID
-- The details of PAIN rows are written first to a temp file, because the header
part of the file contains totals
-- Info: The header line has to be written after the detail lines, because
during the creation of the detail rows, the total for the header are calculated
-- Variables to write header part at the end
-- If one of the description fields is empty, move contents to the previous
variables, to make sure that no "holes" are written to the export file
